member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO structure contains more detailed information about an image logotype.

summary.para: Specifies the type of image. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The image is a grayscale image.
The image is a color image.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.dwFileSize
member.summary: The size, in octets, of the image.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.dwXSize
member.summary: The horizontal size, in pixels, of the image.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.dwYSize
member.summary: The vertical size, in pixels, of the image.

summary.para: Specifies the format of the image resolution. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: No image resolution information is provided.
The image resolution is provided in bits per pixel. The dwNumBits member contains the image resolution.
The image resolution is provided in number of gray tones. The dwTableSize member contains the image resolution.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.dwNumBits
member.summary: The resolution of the image, in bits per pixel. The member is only used if the dwLogotypeImageResolutionChoice contains CERT_LOGOTYPE_NO_IMAGE_RESOLUTION_CHOICE.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.dwTableSize
member.summary: The resolution of the image, in number of gray tones. The member is only used if the dwLogotypeImageResolutionChoice contains CERT_LOGOTYPE_TABLE_SIZE_IMAGE_RESOLUTION_CHOICE.

member.name: CERT_LOGOTYPE_IMAGE_INFO.pwszLanguage
member.summary: The address of a null-terminated IA5 string that contains the RFC 3066 language identifier that specifies the language of the image. This member is optional and may be NULL.
